channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- IDonate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- IDonate

item.title: CVE-2024-3594|2024-05-23T06:00:02.724Z -- Unknown -- IDonate
item.description: The IDonate WordPress plugin through 1.9.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
